profileText: a Representative from Georgia; born in Columbus, Muscogee County, Ga., July 30, 1978; graduated from Talladega High School, Talladega, Ala., 1996; B.A., Talladega College, Talladega, Ala., 2000; professional advocate; vice-chair, Georgia Democratic Party, 2011–2013; acting chair, Georgia Democratic Party, 2013; Delegate, Democratic National Convention, 2008, 2012, and 2016; member of the Georgia state senate, 2017–2021; chair, Georgia Democratic Party, 2019–2021; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021–present).
